main: ^A pearl is a hard, glistening object produced within the soft tissue of a living shelled mollusk or another animal similar to an oyster.

c-0: ^These are often cultured or farmed from pearl oysters which are plentiful in Palawan. A 34-kilogram pearl is said to be found in Palawan was surrendered to Puerto Princesa Tourism Office.
^It is considered to be the largest pearl in the world.
